name: baseangularjs
description: - Node.js 	- bower 	- gulp ##INSTALING ###LINUX / MAC OS X 	sudo npm install bower --global 	sudo npm install gulp  --global 	npm   install 	bower install #USAGE ##GULP COMMANDS ``` gulp debug: find bug in the project. gulp dist:  Build and optimize the current project, ready for deployment. This includes linting as well as image, script, stylesheet and HTML optimization and minification.  gulp server: This outputs an IP address you can use to locally test and another that can be used on devices connected to your network. gulp clean: Delete folder dist from the project. ```
author: Vinicio Valbuena (FormatCom)
